response.original_title: In the Heart of the Sea
response.overview: In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling ship Essex is assaulted by something no one could believe—a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance.
response.tagline: Based on the incredible true story that inspired Moby Dick
response.title: In the Heart of the Sea
